name: Lying Larry
intro:
A notorious smuggler who lies as easily as he breathes.

Larry's entire life is built on deception. He once tried to sell 'dragon eggs' (painted rocks) to a wizard. His greed knows no bounds, and he'll smuggle anything if the price is right. The only honest thing about him is his dishonesty.
appearance: A shifty-eyed man in flashy clothes, with a wide grin and a bag that's suspiciously heavy. He has the look of someone who's always planning their next scheme.
